00026 class XMonteCarloDriver : public XDummyDriver<XPrimaryDriver>
00027 {
00028     XNODE_OBJECT
00029 protected:
00030     XMonteCarloDriver(const char *name, bool runtime,
00031                       const shared_ptr<XScalarEntryList> &scalarentries,
00032                       const shared_ptr<XInterfaceList> &interfaces,
00033                       const shared_ptr<XThermometerList> &thermometers,
00034                       const shared_ptr<XDriverList> &drivers);
00035 public:
00036     //! usually nothing to do
00037     virtual ~XMonteCarloDriver();
00038     //! show all forms belonging to driver
00039     virtual void showForms();
00040 protected:
00041     //! Start up your threads, connect GUI, and activate signals
00042     virtual void start();
00043     //! Shut down your threads, unconnect GUI, and deactivate signals
00044     //! this may be called even if driver has already stopped.
00045     virtual void stop();
00046     
00047     //! this is called when raw is written 
00048     //! unless dependency is broken
00049     //! convert raw to record
00050     virtual void analyzeRaw() throw (XRecordError&);
00051     //! this is called after analyze() or analyzeRaw()
00052     //! record is readLocked
00053     virtual void visualize();
00054 private:
00055     shared_ptr<XDoubleNode> m_targetTemp;
00056     shared_ptr<XDoubleNode> m_targetField;
00057     shared_ptr<XDoubleNode> m_hdirx;

00065     shared_ptr<XDoubleNode> m_minFlips;
00066     shared_ptr<XNode> m_step;
00067     shared_ptr<XComboNode> m_graph3D;

00069         m_entryU, m_entryC, m_entryCoT,
00070         m_entryS, m_entryM, m_entry2in2, m_entry1in3;
